# getGenericSuggestions

Returns suggestions from a list.

## Parameters

| Param        | Type                            | Description                                            |
| ------------ | ------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------ |
| text         | `string`                        | the text to search in the list.                        |
| list         | `Array.<{id: *}>`               | the list of options already selected.                  |
| sourceList   | `Array.<{id: *, name: string}>` | the list where options are searched.                   |
| errorMessage | `string`                        | the error message to show if no suggestions are found. |

## Returns

`Object / Object` - the suggestions.

## Example

```js
import {ListInput, getGenericSuggestions} from '@bluecateng/pelagos';

const Example = ({items}) => {
	const getSuggestions = useCallback(
		(text, list) => getGenericSuggestions(text, list, items, t`No matching items found`),
		[items]
	);
	return <ListInput getSuggestions={getSuggestions} />;
};
```
